Name: Anime show 动漫时装秀
About the game: Twelve sexy girls compete with each other for the title of Miss Anime VR. Take part in the show as jury and decide which girl’s dream will become true and choose the winner of anime fashion show. Become a jury in an entertainment show! It is up to you what will happen with twelve sexy girls. Will their dreams become true? Don’t keep them waiting! Put the VR headset on and prepare yourself for unforgettable experience: twelve beautiful girls will compete on three specially designed, unique stages for the title of Miss Anime Fashion. On each stage girls will present themselves both in directed, joint performance and individually. Sit back and let yourself be pulled in.
